mapper.sql: t1.id as "id" ,t1.account_id as "accountId" ,t1.serial_number as "serialNumber" ,t1.out_trade_date as "outTradeDate" ,t1.trade_code as "tradeCode" ,t1.trade_amount as "tradeAmount" ,t1.currency as "currency" ,t1.is_freeze as "isFreeze" ,t1.out_account_type as "outAccountType" ,t1.out_account_id as "outAccountId" ,t1.out_account_sub_type as "outAccountSubType" ,t1.out_account_sub_id as "outAccountSubId" ,t1.in_account_type as "inAccountType" ,t1.in_account_id as "inAccountId" ,t1.in_account_sub_type as "inAccountSubType" ,t1.in_account_sub_id as "inAccountSubId" ,t1.action_app_user_id as "actionAppUserId" ,t1.state as "state" ,t1.trade_channel as "tradeChannel" ,t1.trade_agency as "tradeAgency" ,t1.out_order_no as "outOrderNo" ,t1.out_order_name as "outOrderName" ,t1.trade_desc as "tradeDesc" ,t1.data as "data" ,t1.biz_type as "bizType" ,t1.biz_type_name as "bizTypeName" ,t1.biz_id as "bizId" ,t1.biz_name as "bizName" ,t1.ref_trade_id as "refTradeId" ,t1.fin_subject_code as "finSubjectCode" ,t1.fin_voucher_id as "finVoucherId" ,t1.date_created as "dateCreated" ,t1.date_updated as "dateUpdated" ,t1.memo as "memo" ,t1.bi_update_ts as "biUpdateTs"
mapper.select:
select
from account_log_transaction t1 where t1.id = #{id}

select
from account_log_transaction t1 where 1=1
order by t1.date_created desc

select
from account_log_transaction t1 where 1=1
order by t1.date_created desc
